name: Dynafit Superlite 150 Bindings
description: Exceptionally light bindings for ultra-fast ski mountaineering or touring missions. Forged aluminum, stainless steel and high-strength synthetics weight in at 300g per pair. Solid on descents, nimble on ascents, and great for race or touring setups.Fully metal heel piece is durable and stable.Anti-snow grooves in toe piece for easy entry in all snow conditions.4 walk modes adapt to the steepness of terrain.Lateral release value setting from 4-13 in heel.Ultralight ski brakes are available and sold separately.
